definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

definition: Barkol grasslands near Hami in Xinjiang

sentences.english: None of this will actually be decided at Bali.
sentences.chinese: 所有這一切實際上都決定在巴里島。

sentences.english: Brazilian defender Emilson Cribari says he's settled at Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 巴西后衛克里巴里說他會留在拉齊奧。

sentences.english: Poor Barry stopped a packet when his car was in collision with a lorry.
sentences.chinese: 巴里的車與一輛卡車相撞，可憐的巴里身負重傷。

sentences.english: Poor Barry stopped a packet when his car was in collision with a lorry.
sentences.chinese: 巴里的車與一輛卡車相撞，可憐的巴里身負重傷。

sentences.english: The United States Navy destroyer Barry fired Tomahawk missiles from the Mediterranean Sea on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 週六，美國海軍驅逐艦巴里從地中海發射戰斧導彈。

sentences.english: The dead cysts in the collection of Barkol Lake were mainly emerged in spring.
sentences.chinese: 巴里坤湖成品滷蟲卵中的死卵主要產生在春季。

sentences.english: Palermo and rumblings of a proposal from southern city Bari followed.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒莫和南部城市巴里也不甘落後地表示了申辦意願。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister of Tunisia Hamadi Jebali has announced his resignation in a live television address.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯總理傑巴里在電視直播講話中宣佈辭職。

sentences.english: Barry Popik's website lists almost one hundred nicknames that describe New York.
sentences.chinese: 巴里Popik的網站列出了近百個綽號，形容紐約。

sentences.english: Rubens had the 11th fastest time in the race today.
sentences.chinese: 巴里切羅在最快圈速上僅排第11位。

sentences.english: Or, buy gold stocks. Try American Barrick or McMorhan.
sentences.chinese: 或者購買黃金證券，試試美國巴里克或麥克莫漢的。

sentences.english: Barrick’s shares fell sharply after the bid was revealed.
sentences.chinese: 當標的價被公開後，巴里克股價急速下跌。

sentences.english: Thereafter Barrichello ran another three laps before refuelling.
sentences.chinese: 此後，巴里切羅在進站之前又跑了三圈。

sentences.english: Zubari published an apology in Yediot on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 週二，祖巴里在《以色列日報》上刊登了道歉聲明。

sentences.english: Barea's best basketball is ahead of him, if they can sign him.
sentences.chinese: 巴里亞如果能夠簽約，他將能打出最好的籃球。

sentences.english: Barry will cope with the sentence; he's done time before.
sentences.chinese: 巴里將能挺過這次刑期，他以前服過刑。

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
Taiwan equivalent of 布什[Bu4 shi2]
